mapper.insert: insert into gg_ythcj_ry_shgx (ID, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, RYXX_ID,GX, XM, XB, HJD, HJDXZ, SFZH, LXDH, PX,RYBH) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ryxxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hjd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hjdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{px,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update gg_ythcj_ry_shgx set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), RYXX_ID = #{ryxxId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GX = #{gx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XM = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XB = #{xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HJD = #{hjd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HJDXZ = #{hjdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFZH = #{sfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LXDH = #{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PX = #{px,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RYBH = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, RYXX_ID,GX, XM, XB, HJD, HJDXZ, SFZH, LXDH, PX,RYBH from gg_ythcj_ry_shgx where isdel = 0 and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, RYXX_ID,GX,XM, XB, HJD, HJDXZ, SFZH, LXDH, PX,RYBH from gg_ythcj_ry_shgx
1=1 and isdel = 0
and RYBH = '${rybh}'
